sourcesContent:
import './watchListItem.css' const WatchListItem = ({game = {}}) => { return (

{game.title}

{game.currentDiscountEndDate ? "Ends in " + Math.floor((new Date(game.currentDiscountEndDate) - new Date()) / 86400000) + " days" : ""}

{game.basePrice}

{game.currentDiscountPrice ? game.currentDiscountPrice : ""}

{game.currentDiscountPrice ? Math.round(100 - game.currentDiscountedPrice / (game.basePrice / 100)) + "%" : ""}

cdscds

) } export default WatchListItem;
